channel.title: Fear on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Fear on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: whatever. haha.
item.description: herersync is my friend. I have a lot of friends. I was worried that I didn’t have any. I expressed that recently in a fit of fear and sorrow. however. I really do. thanks friends. all of you are wonderful.

item.title: Once again fear is present...
item.description: So I find myself once again having that pit of fear riding in my stomach. This time it again seems like WW3 is upon us. I got proof. Check out this, or this and finally this.
